sentences.sentence: He ran away and spoke to one of a group of three men who were conferring together.
sentences.translation: 他跑开，对正在商量事情的三个人中的其中一个人说了几句话。

sentences.sentence: Ceremony of conferring graduation certificates will be hold in auditorium.
sentences.translation: 颁发毕业证书的仪式将在校礼堂进行。

sentences.sentence: That compulsion has resulted in robotics — the science of conferring various human capabilities on machines.
sentences.translation: 这种动力产生了机器人科学——一门将人类的能力赋予机器的科学。
